Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $120 by myself. This product has been meticulously designed to provide exceptional value and quality. Considering its high standards and benefits, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $110. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the superior quality and functionality it offers. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
